subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Two days after Chris Perez stepped aside as the team’s closer, the Indians clinched at least a spot in a wild-card tiebreaker after beating the Twins, 5-1, for their ninth consecutive victory.
snippet: Two days after Chris Perez stepped aside as the team’s closer, the Indians clinched at least a spot in a wild-card tiebreaker after beating the Twins, 5-1, for their ninth consecutive victory.
